org.itemscript.core.exceptions
Class ItemscriptError

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          java.lang.RuntimeException
              org.itemscript.core.exceptions.ItemscriptError
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ItemscriptError
extends java.lang.RuntimeException

The base class for all exceptions thrown by the Itemscript system.

Author:
Jacob Davies
jacob@itemscript.org
See Also:

internalError

public static ItemscriptError internalError(java.lang.Object source,
                                            java.lang.String keySuffix)
Create a new exception with the given source and message key suffix.

Parameters:
source - An instance of the object where this exception originated.
keySuffix - The key suffix to add to the default Itemscript error prefix.
Returns:
A new ItemscriptError.

internalError

                                            java.lang.String keySuffix,
                                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)

Parameters:
source - An instance of the object where this exception originated.
keySuffix - The key suffix to add to the default Itemscript error prefix.
params - The parameters that go with this error.
Returns:
A new ItemscriptError.

param - The single parameter that goes with this error.

internalError

public static ItemscriptError internalError(java.lang.Object source,
                                            java.lang.String keySuffix,
                                            java.lang.Throwable cause)
Create a new exception with the given source, message key suffix, and cause.

Parameters:
source - An instance of the object where this exception originated.
keySuffix - The key suffix to add to the default Itemscript error prefix.
cause - The exception that caused this error.
Returns:
A new ItemscriptError.

key

public java.lang.String key()
Get the message key for this exception.

Returns:
The message key.

params

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params()
Get the params for this exception.

Returns:
A Map<String,String> of params, or null if there was no params map.

singleParam

public java.lang.String singleParam()
Get the single param for this exception.

Returns:
The single param, or null if there was no single param.
